description: Generous with experience but less popular with farmers and is not so good with materials on harvesting.
This animal is unpleasant and so worth fewer beans.
Harvesting this animal will award more materials but at the cost of lower experience and bean value.
This animal is worth more beans when sold.
Other farmers will happily purchase this animal, but it's not so good for experience or materials.
This animal is considered very special and farmers will pay more beans for it.
